评论详情: This is NOT a $12 bag. This bag is not “made of linen”, nor is it “durable”.  This is a faded out print on a cheap, polyester zipper pouch that would fall apart within two uses, if I were to be foolish enough to try to use it for cosmetics on a trip (not to mention offering zero protection for the actual cosmetics).  The camera on my phone is too good to show how dull the coloring actually is. I cannot even make out the face of one of the two peacocks.  I’ve bought nicer cosmetics bags, in a pinch, at a dollar store.
It's beautiful and a good size
